summary: An ordinance approving and confirming the assessment and assessment roll of Local Improvement District No. 6246 for the improvement of 26th Ave. West from West Dravus Street to West Grover Street; by paving and otherwise improving the same; under Ordinance No. 90142, and levying and assessing the amounts thereof against the several lots, tracts, parcels of land and other property as shown on said roll, establishing a Local Improvement Fund.
